::Epyon::

He walked up to Iron Raptor.
"Madam Commander, I have a proposal to make. With the Cybertronian Fire
nearly destroyed, I think it would be a good idea to salvage what is
possible and merge it with mybase. Between whats left of the CF and the
Star Jumper, we could build a under water city base. It would be more
defendable, do to the fact that enemys would have to fight under water.
What do you say?"
